author: David Ng, David Ng
title: WHO Announces Celebrity Coronavirus Concert While Facing Accusations Over Chinese Influence
description: The World Health Organization, which is facing accusations that it has allowed the Chinese Communist Party to influence its policy in the midst of the coronavirus pandemic, has announced with Lady Gaga an A-list coronavirus celebrity concert that will be broa…
